list.name: Default
list.comment:
Merge remote-tracking branch 'remotes/origin/master' into JS-research_calculations
# Conflicts: # application/app.py

task.summary:
Fixes several bugs around playing cards - I got it to play into the second age without issues now.
Includes all players info for front end (but only your hand), along with maximum slots for wonders and research card counters.
Includes military point calculations at the end of each round.
Reinstates polling.
Includes guards to stop multiple card playing per round, and avoids multiple players being created or hands being dealt due to weird latency bugs.

Fixes several bugs around playing cards - I got it to play into the second age without back end issues now.
Includes all players info for front end (but only your hand), along with maximum slots for wonders and research card counters.
Includes military point calculations at the end of each round.
Reinstates polling.
Includes guards to stop multiple card playing per round, and avoids multiple players being created or hands being dealt due to weird latency bugs.
----------------------
Introduces some issues with the front end, presumably due to the change in information sent through: - Wonder board not showing now - Goes back to 'start game' screen each time, which needs pushing to send back through to game screen
Here is an example of what is sent to the back (array of players, then array of cards for the one player) from print_json... doesn't include a few extras that are added in the API:
{'player': [{'id': 1, 'gameId': 1, 'userId': 1, 'ready': True, 'left_id': 3, 'right_id': 2, 'wonder': 'The Hanging Gardens of Babylon', 'wonder_level': 0, 'max_wonder': 3, 'wood': 0, 'brick': 1, 'ore': 0, 'stone': 0, 'glass': 0, 'paper': 0, 'cloth': 0, 'extra_wood': 0, 'extra_brick': 0, 'extra_ore': 0, 'extra_stone': 0, 'extra_glass': 0, 'extra_paper': 0, 'extra_cloth': 0, 'points': 0, 'military': 0, 'money': 3, 'cog': 0, 'tablet': 0, 'compass': 0}, {'id': 2, 'gameId': 1, 'userId': 4, 'ready': True, 'left_id': 1, 'right_id': 3, 'wonder': 'The Lighthouse of Alexandria', 'wonder_level': 0, 'max_wonder': 3, 'wood': 0, 'brick': 0, 'ore': 0, 'stone': 0, 'glass': 1, 'paper': 0, 'cloth': 0, 'extra_wood': 0, 'extra_brick': 0, 'extra_ore': 0, 'extra_stone': 0, 'extra_glass': 0, 'extra_paper': 0, 'extra_cloth': 0, 'points': 0, 'military': 0, 'money': 3, 'cog': 0, 'tablet': 0, 'compass': 0}, {'id': 3, 'gameId': 1, 'userId': 2, 'ready': True, 'left_id': 2, 'right_id': 1, 'wonder': 'The Mausoleum of Halicarnassus', 'wonder_level': 0, 'max_wonder': 3, 'wood': 0, 'brick': 0, 'ore': 0, 'stone': 0, 'glass': 0, 'paper': 0, 'cloth': 1, 'extra_wood': 0, 'extra_brick': 0, 'extra_ore': 0, 'extra_stone': 0, 'extra_glass': 0, 'extra_paper': 0, 'extra_cloth': 0, 'points': 0, 'military': 0, 'money': 3, 'cog': 0, 'tablet': 0, 'compass': 0}],'cards': [{'id': 29, 'name': 'Lumber Yard', 'noPlayers': 3, 'age': 1, 'colour': 'brown', 'costWood': 0, 'costBrick': 0, 'costOre': 0, 'costStone': 0, 'costGlass': 0, 'costPaper': 0, 'costCloth': 0, 'prerequisite1': '', 'prerequisite2': '', 'giveWood': 1, 'giveBrick': 0, 'giveOre': 0, 'giveStone': 0, 'giveGlass': 0, 'givePaper': 0, 'giveCloth': 0, 'resourceAlternating': False, 'givePoints': 0, 'giveMilitary': 0, 'giveMoney': 0, 'giveResearch': ''}, {'id': 33, 'name': 'Timber Yard', 'noPlayers': 3, 'age': 1, 'colour': 'brown', 'costWood': 0, 'costBrick': 0, 'costOre': 0, 'costStone': 0, 'costGlass': 0, 'resourceAlternating': True, 'givePoints': 0, 'giveMilitary': 0, 'giveMoney': 0, 'giveResearch': ''}, {'id': 40, 'name': 'Marketplace', 'noPlayers': 3, 'age': 1, 'colour': 'yellow', 'costWood': 0, 'costBrick': 0, 'costOre': 0, 'costStone': 0, 'costGlass': 0, 'costPaper': 0, 'costCloth': 0, 'prerequisite1': '', 'prerequisite2': '', 'giveWood': 0, 'giveBrick': 0, 'giveOre': 0, 'giveStone': 0, Fixes several bugs around playing cards - I got it to play into the second age without back end issues now.
Includes all players info for front end (but only your hand), along with maximum slots for wonders and research card counters.
Includes military point calculations at the end of each round.
Reinstates polling.
Includes guards to stop multiple card playing per round, and avoids multiple players being created or hands being dealt due to weird latency bugs.
----------------------
Introduces some issues with the front end, presumably due to the change in information sent through: - Wonder board not showing now - Goes back to 'start game' screen each time, which needs pushing to send back through to game screen

Fixed some issues I had missed, and included military losses for front end info.

Adds in research card point calculations
Rearranges logic.py and renames some functions
Adds end game status "Completed" to game_status API.

Merge remote-tracking branch 'remotes/origin/master' into JS-research_calculations
# Conflicts: # application/app.py

MESSAGE.value:
Fixes several bugs around playing cards - I got it to play into the second age without issues now.
Includes all players info for front end (but only your hand), along with maximum slots for wonders and research card counters.
Includes military point calculations at the end of each round.
Reinstates polling.
Includes guards to stop multiple card playing per round, and avoids multiple players being created or hands being dealt due to weird latency bugs.

Reinstates polling.
Includes guards to stop multiple card playing per round, and avoids multiple players being created or hands being dealt due to weird latency bugs.
